derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from preposition, by substitution of the prefix post- for pre-

means.word_mean: 1. (linguistics) the placing of one linguistic element after another (as placing a modifier after the word that it modifies in a sentence or placing an affix after the base to which it is attached)
